tool_description: Optimizes existing routes in real-time based on current traffic conditions, incidents, and user preferences to minimize travel time and distance.

route_id.description: Identifier of the route to optimize

optimization_goal.description: Primary optimization objective: time, distance, fuel, comfort

error_messages: Route not found: The specified route_id does not exist or is invalid.
Invalid traffic data: Current traffic data is malformed or incomplete.
Invalid optimization goal: Use one of [time, distance, fuel, comfort].
Invalid avoid conditions: Use only [light, moderate, heavy, severe, incidents].
Invalid detour limit: max_detour must be between 0 and 100 percent.
usage: Provide route_id and current_traffic data. Set optimization_goal to prioritize time, distance, fuel efficiency, or comfort. Use avoid_conditions to specify traffic situations to avoid.

optimized_route_id.description: New identifier for the optimized route

optimization_applied.description: Whether any optimizations were applied to the original route

time_saved.description: Estimated time savings in minutes compared to original route

new_waypoints.description: Updated coordinate sequence for optimized route
